description.value:
[Promotional]

Prerequisites Player is wearing or carrying an accessory that promotes Pathfinder Society

Cost 0 Fame

Effect Up to twice per adventure, you can spend an action to reduce the severity of your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied] condition by 1.

Special A PC can only slot one promotional boon at a time.
